title: This font is really bugging me!
content:

comments.content:
Hi Martin,

[Brody Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20090907060503/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=brody&sample_text=Willie%20Nelson%20%26%20Band%20of%20Horses) is a very similar style, but no perfect match.  
F
I also found one called Honey Script if anyone was interested
